Posts.EditableText:
lovin' the hair froth.  I had long hair once, did the whole goth scene, went all out etc. Unfortunately, you just can't be yourself without being pointed at in some places, so I stay low, jeans and un-branded t-shirts 4tw.

Elex, I'll have my motorbike on the road by friday, so I'll be making a few surprise visits to Manchester now and then, should meet up.
Posts.HTML:
lovin' the hair froth. I had long hair once, did the whole goth scene, went all out etc. Unfortunately, you just can't be yourself without being pointed at in some places, so I stay low, jeans and un-branded t-shirts 4tw.

Posts.EditableText:
That is one of my favorite things about Houston (pop. 2mill+)...
No matter how strange you are or look there is always somebody stranger.
People are very accepting here (I wear my T-shirts that you guys hate and nobody tries to kill me).  If you make it to Texas ever, try to visit Houston.
Posts.HTML:
That is one of my favorite things about Houston (pop. 2mill+)...
No matter how strange you are or look there is always somebody stranger.
People are very accepting here (I wear my T-shirts that you guys hate and nobody tries to kill me). If you make it to Texas ever, try to visit Houston.

Posts.EditableText:
you'd get shot around here for wearing anything that is slightly discriminating to anybody.  Lots of mixed races/trends/cultures etc. here.

But if you look like you listen to heavy metal, and you're walking alone (or with a couple of other friends), you're more likely to get mugged and stabbed by a group of 16 scallies.

I remember walking home and being jumped in broad daylight.  Fortunately i'm a tough cookie and put up a good enough fight to only get slashed with glass on the shoulder (Only because he missed my head).
Posts.HTML:
